body.name: Smart Watches for Women, 1.91" HD Fitness Tracker Watch with Blood Pressure/Heart Rate Monitor, Bluetooth 5.3 Make Calls Smart Watch for Android/iOS Phones, IP68 Waterproof Fitness Watch for Women
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 51 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 51 mins
features: 🏆【3 Watch Straps, 3 Wearing Styles】 Banlvs’ new smart watch for women adopts a larger and higher-definition screen design, and come with three watch bands of different colors and materials. The bright golden frame and golden stainless steel strap perfectly enhance the elegance of the overall outfit. Paired with pink and purple silicone straps, it is very casual in sports and daily life. Different watch straps are suitable for different scenes and outfits. Feel free to change straps and styles, there is always a strap that can perfectly blend with different styles.

🏆【24H Care for Women's Health】The smart heart rate monitor watch uses optimized sensors, allowing the smart watch to collect health data more accurately. The fitness watch for women can monitor blood pressure heart rate, blood oxygen, sleep, etc., More importantly, we pay more attention to women's health and have added the function of monitoring menstrual cycles, safe periods, ovulation periods, and ovulation days to provide women with more comprehensive and detailed care.

🏆【Perfect Figure, Perfect Women】The fitness watch for women has built-in 120+ sports modes, which can track and record your heart rate, distance, steps and calories in real time during your running, cycling, yoga and other sports. The women fitness tracker also can set sport goals to make your exercise more motivated and effective. It is your best companion during exercise and fitness. Note: This sport watch can obtain GPS positioning through your mobile phone and clearly upload your movement path.

🏆【Don’t Miss Anything】The callable smart watch is compatible with iOS and Android phones. It uses the latest Bluetooth 5.3 connection technology, which can answer/make calls stably and clearly. Synchronize address book contacts and save call records. At the same time, you will accurately receive text messages, information notifications from Facebook, Youtube, ins, tiktok and other APPs, helping you not to miss any information and news. The women digital watch is a good helper for your daily work life.

🏆【Long Battery Life, Waterproof and Sweatproof】Banlvs smart watch uses a 300mAh large-capacity battery. It has a perfect appearance and guarantees a long use time of 7-9 days, allowing you to easily experience uninterrupted smart life. It is a necessity for business trips. The smart watch adopts IP68 waterproof technology, which can easily handle daily use. This watch is the best choice as a gift for family, friends, and lovers. If you encounter any problems during use, please feel free to contact the customer after-sales service team.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wear Banlvs Smart Watch to Show Your Feminine Charm ！

Why can't smartwatches record steps? Before using the step tracking feature, please shake the watch to allow it to sense vibrations and initiate step counting. Does the smart watch compatible with iOS phones or Android phones? Why can't my watch receive text messages? This smart watch is compatible with both Android/iOS phones. First, confirm that phone can receive text messages and display text message content, turn on all message notifications in the APP. After setup is complete, try pairing the watch again. Does this watch have a blood pressure function? Yes, This fitness watch not only monitors blood pressure, but also adds new functions such as menstruation recording. How long can it be used on a single charge? 5-7 days for daily use. Charging time is about 2 hours. What should I do if I don’t know how to use the product or if the product is defective? We have a professional service team to solve your problems. They will help you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for daily activities.
reviews.reviewText: This new watch has surpassed all my expectations, earning a well-deserved 5-star rating in my book. Its sleek design seamlessly blends style and functionality, catching the eye with a modern aesthetic while offering a multitude of features that enhance its overall appeal. The craftsmanship is impeccable, ensuring durability and precision. The watch boasts advanced technology, from its accurate timekeeping to its impressive array of smart features, making it a versatile companion for both casual and formal occasions. Its user-friendly interface and intuitive controls add to the overall satisfaction, allowing for effortless customization. This timepiece not only exemplifies excellence in design but also delivers a seamless and enjoyable user experience, truly deserving its 5-star accolade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart Watches for Women
reviews.reviewText: Very nice watch for the price. Loaded with features although the instructions for use are very limited and you have to play around with it to figure it out - which is part of the fun. The app is pretty straight forward and works well. BT connection is very stable and range is as expected. The large face makes it easy to read. Phone feature works well with clear reception on both ends. Battery life has been good so far. The gold band is quite elegant. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NICE LOOKING WATCH WITH GREAT FEATURES
reviews.reviewText: Before this purchase, I would only wear a watch as a luxury/jewelry type item. After suffering a recent stroke, I had been searcing for a smart watch that would easily keep track of health data, especially during sleep. This watch is an upgrade from my traditional watch because it has several face options, includes apps, data, and adds notifications to your wrist. I can even use it to answer my phone. Also, I use it to track my activities (Exercising, Road cycling, dancing), and enjoy looking at the data it provides. It tracks my steps, and heart rate blood presssure and so much more! Although it took me a while to figure out the features of this watch, I must say that it is a great deal for the price. And with this watch I not only have style, I have a watch that "puts the future of health" on my wrist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Bad For The Price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Good: Functions well, comfortable, many watch faces to select from, stylish, most apps appear to function properly minus a few (see below)The Not-So-Good: Cannot Reply to texts, Weather App Incorrectly functioning, Camera App Doesn’t Function, Straps are Challenging to Remove/Replace.Overall: The price point makes it a decent purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Great Quality
reviews.reviewText: I'm always shocked when I buy something cheap for my daughter thinking it's good enough for a starter and it turns out to be great. This is one of those. It looks like an Apple watch, has a lot of the same features as one as well. It definitely doesn't run as smoothly as one though. It's slower, clumsier and the icons aren't as finished looking as a true Apple watch, but man...it's pretty good for what it is. It does sleep tracking, text, the talk feature is good and clear on both ends, it has deep breathe, monitors heart rate, and does the EKG, you can change watch faces and the layout of the apps, and there are a ton more features. I'm Impressed. She's one of the boujiest 10y/o's I know and she loves this thing. Shes a Tiffany's diamond working on a pawn shop budget, kind of girl. The fact that she likes it sells it for me. I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WINNER, WINNER, CHICKEN DINNER
reviews.reviewText: After my husband gifted me with this smart, I doubted that he chose the best watch for me. I dove into Amazon and researched the others and realized he chose the perfect smart watch for me. I use so many of the health features everyday, BP, step tracker, sleep tracker. Phone calls are clear. I can choose a personal display. The only issue I have may be due to how I have it's defaults, but the display changes faces switch at will. I like to keep the flower display. I like that other straps are available. It fun to change to different color straps. I also bought the screen saver to keep the face protected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOTIFICATION OF SMS
reviews.reviewText: THIS WATCH IS OK,... THE FUNCTIONALITY IS MEDIOCRE, ALMOST GENERIC TO ALL SMARTWATCHES THAT ARE NOT APPLE, FITBIT, ETC.THE MOBILE APP IS LACKING IN WHAT IT CAN CONTROL ON THE WATCH ITSELF AND IS NOT VERY USER-FRIENDLY.THE WATCH ITSELF HAS TWO NICE FEATURES BEIGN THE MAIN CONTROL (CROW) AND THE CUSTOMIZABLE BUTTON BELOW IT. MAKES IT EASIER TO NAVIGATE AROUND WITHOUT HAVING TO ALWAYS REVERT BACK TO THE WATCHFACETHE WIDE VARITY WATCHFACES IS NICE.. AND THEY ARE MORE INTRICATE THAN OTHER SMARTWATCHES I'VE EXPLORED.THE ONE MAIN CAVEAT THAT MAKES THIS WATCD DESERVE 3 STARS IS THAT THE "VIEWING " OF SMS IS JUST THAT; IT IS A "PREVIEW" AND DOES NOT DISPLAY THE ENTIRE MESSAGE.THERE ARE OTHER SMARTWATCHES OUT THERE THAT HAVE AT LEAST 3X THE CHARACTER LIMIT; IN THIS PARTICULAR ASPECCT, THIS WATCH IS DEFINITELY SUB-PAR. THE LACK OF THIS FEATURE RENDERS THE WATCH USELESS IN TERMS OF SMS AND NOTIFICATIONS BECAUSE YOU IMMINENTLY HAVE TO PICK UP YOUR PHONE TO DISPLAY THE FULL MESSAGE. THIS WAS MY MAIN FOCUS FOR USING A SMARTWATCH BUT AGAIN, IT DOES NOT PERFORM TO ITS EXPECTATIONS.OVERALL, THE WATCH IS OK... VERY GENERIC TO OTHER SMART WATCHES, AND DOES NOT HAVE ANY FEATURES THAT MAKE THIS WATCH BETTER THAN THE NEXT.HOPE THIS REVIEW HELPED YOU MAKE A MORE INFORMED DECISION ON WHETHER OR NOT TO PURCHASE THIS WATCH.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like that it has lots of options: tracking health monitors for BP, Heart, Steps, and is connected to my phone. I can answer a call or see a txt message and read it on the watch.Dislike: the face of the watch is kind of bulky/ big. I have bigger bones in my wrists, my sister has small bones and hands, she said the band/watch face was to big for her wrist.Love that it has the B/P option and a great deal on cost compared to Garmin etc

reviews.reviewTitle: Un Smart Watch bonito y completo.
reviews.reviewText: - Lo compré para un regalo para mi mujer y la verdad fue un gran acierto. Aparte de muy bonito por la combinación de colores, la pantalla espectacular de 1.32” y la cantidad de utilidades que incorpora mi esposa está encantada.- Este aparatito incorpora 120 modos de deporte, en el tema salud Ciclo menstrual, frecuencia cardiaca, oxígeno en sangre, presión arterial, monitor de sueño etc. También incorpora Bluetthot 5.2, micrófono, altavoz alta fidelidad. Puede recibir notificaciones de redes sociales SMS etc., escuchar música hacer llamadas, recibirlas etc.- En cuanto al apartado de duración de la batería 30 Días en modo de espera, 7 días de uso y 2 horas de carga aprox.- En definitiva un Smart Watch con una cantidad de funciones y atractivo indiscutibles y manual en castellano.- Espero que este comentario les sea de utilidad.
Montre parfaite et très jolie. Arrivée assez rapidement. Elle est fournie avec son bracelet plus 2 en sus.Je recommande

Montre connectée élégante. Cadeau pour ma femme qui l'a tout de suite adoptée. Très bon rapport entre poids et taille de l'écran. Utilisation très intuitive pour passer d'un écran à un autre, pour paramétrer la montre... On a tout de suite accès aux informations courantes : surveiller son rythme cardiaque (le jour, pendant le sommeil), son nombre de pas, les calories perdues... Et il existe un grand nombre d'autres modes que nous n'avons pas encore explorés. La montre est livrée avec 2 bracelets facilement interchangeables et très jolis. Un excellent choix avec un très bon rapport qualité/prix. Je la recommande vivement.

Wir haben die Smartwatch für meine Mutter als Geschenk bestellt. Sehr schönes und modernes Design, sehen recht solide und wertig aus. Gut verarbeitet. Ein Ersatzarmband wird mitgeliefert. Alle versprochenen Funktionen funktionieren nach der Installation der App. Der Akku hält eine Woche lang (wenn die Uhr ständig verwendet wird). Mutter hat sich sehr über das Geschenk gefreut, sie hat es schnell mit der Bedienung zurechtgefunden.Der einzige Nachteil ist der Verschluss am Armband, wenn er sich an etwas verfängt, besteht die Möglichkeit, das er aufgeht und Uhr fällt von Hangelenk ab. Wir haben es bei einer Rabattaktion gekauft, Preis Leistung super.

Der Tracker sieht sehr edel aus.Das glitzernde Armband ist mit einen Mangnetverschluss versehen.Somit lässt sie sich schnell und einfach anpassen. Im Lieferumfang sind außerdem noch zwei weitere Armbänder verhanden.Diese sind aus Kunststoff und extrem gut zu reinigen. Der Tracker lässt sich leicht bedienen.Er hat viele Anwendungsbereiche.Unteranderem Messung der Herzfrequenz,Messung des Schlafes und vieles mehr.Aber besondere beeindruckend finde ich,dass sie auch die Körpertemperatur misst.Das mitgelieferte Ladegerät ist perfekt. Der Tracker wird nur in die passende Position eingeklemmt und schon wird geladen.Somit wird auch das runterfallen des Tickets verhindert.Preis-Leistung geht zu 100%durch.
